I love being a traveller rather than a tourist; exploring new places for a period of time and getting involved in the local culture and cuisine. it really is the best way to see the world.
Finally got to tick off the Cherry Blossoms from the fuck it list. So refreshing to be back exploring amazing nature, culture and food!

Embarking on a journey of wanderlust, I found myself immersed in the beauty of unfamiliar landscapes. From vibrant city streets to tranquil natural wonders, my travel experience was a tapestry of captivating moments. Every step unraveled hidden treasures.
Just fallen into hole on beach in Barbados. Sick.

i like to travel to new places whether it is miles away or close to home i enjoy going to new places see new things meeting different people and seeing how they live and what they do. I am very soicalable and seem to get on with most people. It's great to get away and relax

I have just returned from a fantastic trip to the Maldives. I enjoyed beautiful clear water and was able to snorkel and see exotic fish and sea creatures. I strongly recommend that people should visit the Maldives once in their lifetime.

I have been to many different places in the world. I find the best places are the ones where it is hard for tourists to get into and out of. That is where you have the most authentic and enriching experiences being near locals and away from other tourists. The food is better then
Travel is the best thing anyone can do. You must see how beautiful this earth is within your life, it not only enriches your soul but you will build connections and memories to last you a lifetime.
Went to the most beautiful place at the weekend - beach front, stunning coastal views and a perfect British seaside cafe!
30 degrees in December? Yes please!
We have just been to Greece, uts the most beautiful place with fantastic friendly local people - definitely recommend everyone visiting there.

Just back from a fantastic holiday in the sunshine. Great time travelling around some beautiful places with my partner and getting away from the cold weather back home! Had so much fun and so exciting to explore somewhere new.

I don't understand how people can get on the Tube and just stand there reading peacefully. I spend every Tube journey as a tense ball of anxiety, counting down to my stop or trying to figure out my route of escape if it gets too busy.
I will be spending Christmas in Bangkok this year, love the culture, love the food, love the people, love the heat and chaos of the this crazy mad city.

I traveled to Edinburgh with my dad the other day on the train, while there we look around the Christmas market at the different stalls, we then went on a long walk round to Edinburgh castle we ended up doing a whole circle, the market was all lit up in the evening time.
I recently visited Barcelona for the second time and had a great trip. The city was as beautiful as ever, the people were friendly, and it was wonderful to see and experience Spanish culture.

It's holiday time and I'm excited to be spending 2 weeks in sunny Dorset. The rolling green spaces and warm hospitality are just the reset I need formy tired batteries. I'd recommend to anyone coming here to book online and you're sure to snap up a great last minute deal. Enjoy!!
Just arrived at the LA #ComicCon. Will be at booth 349. Dinosaur costume. Come say hi!

My trip to Croatia was amazing! Although the travel there was a little rocky, we landed safely. It was so much fun exploring and eating amazing seafood every day! The sea was beautiful and our hotel was just magnificient!
